data.title: Columbia University Athletics
data.meta_description: Lydia KopeckyEpee  - 2012-13: Team captain ...Â NCAA Northeast Regional qualifier ... Placed third at Ivy League Round Robins to secure first team All-Ivy League
data.text:
2012-13: Team captain ... NCAA Northeast Regional qualifier ... Placed third at Ivy League Round Robins to secure first team All-Ivy League honors.

2011-12: Second team All-America at the NCAA Championships ... finished eighth in women's epee after she won 15 of 23 bouts ... finished fifth at NCAA Northeast Regionals to qualify for the national championships ... posted a 9-5 record at the Ivy League Championships ... won all three bouts she fenced vs. Yale and both bouts fenced vs. Brown ... went 5-0 vs. NYU, Sacred Heart and Vassar at The Historical Meet Plus.

2010-11: Won 13 of 23 bouts at the NCAA Championships to finish seventh in women's epee, gaining second team All-American ... placed third at NCAA Regionals to qualify for the NCAA Championships ... was second team All-Ivy League after winning 12 of 18 bouts ... swept all three bouts from Harvard at the St. John's Super Cup ... went 6-0 vs. NYU and Vassar at the NYU Historical Meet Plus.

2009-10: Qualified for 2010 NCAA Championships in first year ... captured eight victories in women's epee ... finished third at the Under-19 competition at U.S. Summer Nationals in Atlanta ... first team All-Ivy League ... won 14 of 18 bouts during 2010 Ivy League Championships ... won eight of nine bouts during first day of competition, helping Lions to 3-0 mark ... swept all three bouts against Harvard at St. John's Invitational ... captured seven of nine bouts in multi-team meet against NYU, Sacred Heart and Vassar ... advanced to the round of 16 in Junior Women's Epee at San Jose North American Cup.

At Northside College Prep: Did not fence.

Outside Experience: Nationally ranked ... medaled at Summer Junior Nationals event in 2008 ... 13th at Senior North American Cup in 2009 ... 14th at Senior North American Cup in 2008 ... fenced for DC Fencers Club.

Personal: Political science major ... daughter of Gerald Kopecky and Marion McCreedy ... enjoys running, cooking and coaching fencing ... was an elite gymnast ... b. January 6, 1991 in Chicago.

Overall Record:

2009-10: 43-32

2010-11: 33-16

2011-12: 26-16

2012-13: 34-14

Overall: 138-78
